name: Maintenance Snippets
author: Matheus Martins

sections.description: This plugin gives you a report of plugins that are not updated. Then you can copy and paste the old version plus the new version to send to your clients telling them what you’ve done for your maintenance work.
sections.installation:
The process to install this plugin is the default one:

  1. Upload maintenance-snippets folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

The process to install this plugin is the default one:

  1. Upload maintenance-snippets folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

Can I export those plugins?

Not yet. This will be the next feature I’ll add.
sections.changelog:
0.1.0

  • The beta version of the plugin
  • Plugin’s update view

short_description: This plugin gives you a report of plugins that need updates.
description: This plugin gives you a report of plugins that are not updated. Then you can copy and paste the old version plus the new version to send to your clients telling them what you’ve done for your maintenance work.
